summary: Kandahar is the second largest city in Afghanistan, located in the south. It's a very important city for the Taliban, even though Kabul is the official capital. With a rich history, it was once the capital of the Afghan Empire and has been fought over by many empires due to its strategic location. Kandahar is a major trading center, especially for fruits and wool. The city is also culturally significant for the Pashtuns community. Historically, it's one of the oldest human settlements, dating back to around 1000-750 BC.
title: Kandahar
